member.name: T:Web.API.Domain.Entity.BaseEntity
member.summary: Serves as base for all data models.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.BaseEntity.Id
member.summary: Represents the primary key for data models derived from
member.value: Property Id represents an entity's primary key

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.BaseEntity.Created
member.summary: Denotes the date and time of creation of the entity.
member.value: Timestamp of creation of the entity.
member.remarks: Value must be set manually using approaches like auditing or triggers etc.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.BaseEntity.Modified
member.summary: Denotes the date and time of the last modification to the entity.
member.value: Timestamp of last updation of the entity.
member.remarks: Value must be set manually using approaches like auditing or triggers etc.

member.name: T:Web.API.Domain.Entity.User.User
member.summary: Data model that represents a user.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.User.User.FirstName
member.summary: Represents first name of the user.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.User.User.LastName
member.summary: Represents last name of the user.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.User.User.MiddleName
member.summary: Represents middle name of the user.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.User.User.Username
member.summary: Represents login username for the user.
member.remarks: The Username property has a max length of 25 characters.

member.name: P:Web.API.Domain.Entity.User.User.Password
member.summary: Represents the login password for the user.
